name: How to balance your fragmented needs?
name_original: How to balance your fragmented needs?
description:
It is a serious but humorous game that combines cards and AR (the card content and numerical settings are inspired by my friends and myself. real experience). It is used to help people understand and try to sort out how to properly arrange and control the proportion of personal improvement and pure entertainment while they are eager for both of them.  

Simultaneously feed two extremely hungry "split brains",the dopamine brain and the self-improvement brain, as much as they want to eat in 180 seconds, while meeting the breakdown value , all the clearance conditions of the active values of the two brains, you can clear the game.

(The card assets and cover of this game are made of multiple pictures produced by the midjourney algorithm after collaging and photoshop modification by myself.）
